index.html.DESCRIPTION1: A Minecraft mapart schematic and map.dat generator, designed to be feasible for both server admins and survival players on servers like
index.html.DESCRIPTION5: , with the goal to add much-requested features and removing the need to download a program
index.html.DESCRIPTION6: Feel free to message me on Discord
index.html.DESCRIPTION8: , feature requests and bug reports go on
index.html.MAPPREVIEW-TT-BESTRES: A source image with this resolution will work the best
index.html.MAPPREVIEW-TT-DOESNTMATCH: Image doesn't match map's aspect ratio
index.html.SETTINGS-TT-MODE: Select the mode you'd like to operate in
index.html.SETTINGS-TT-VERSION: Select the version closest to what you're running
index.html.SETTINGS-TT-CROP: Crops your image instead of stretching it out
index.html.SETTINGS-TT-3D: Makes the map 3D. Harder to build, but 3 times the colors!
index.html.SETTINGS-TT-UNOBT: Enables map.dat colors unobtainiable in schematics
index.html.SETTINGS-TT-DITHER: Adds seemingly random pixels for the illusion of more colors
index.html.SETTINGS-SPLITMATERIALS: Only show max mats per split
index.html.SETTINGS-TT-SPLITMATERIALS: For material reuse with locked maps
index.html.DOWNLOAD-TT-NBTSPLIT: Download the nbt split into 1x1 chunks
index.html.DOWNLOAD-TT-MAPDAT: Download the map.dat split into 1x1 chunks
index.html.DOWNLOAD-TT-PDN: Downloads color palette for use in Paint.net

js/app.js.EDGEWARNING: Note: using Microsoft Edge is unsupported.\nPlease use Chrome (preferred) or Firefox for MapartCraft
js/app.js.PDNWARNING2: colors, while the maximum in Paint.net is 96\nSome colors will be unavailable in Paint.net
js/app.js.HELPNOTE: Note: Help will only be provided in English
js/app.js.PRESETS-ENTERNAME: Enter a name for your preset:
js/app.js.PRESETS-SHARELINK: Share this link to share your currently selected blocks
js/app.js.PRESETS-DEFAULTERROR: This is a default preset and can't be edited/deleted.
js/app.js.PRESETS-TT-SHARE: Shares the blocks you have currently selected as a link
